content.c_answer2: The Phantom of the Opera is 2 hours 30 minutes (incl. interval). Performances starting at 2:30pm finish at approx. 5pm, and performances starting at 7:30pm finish at approx. 10pm
content.name: How long is The Phantom of the Opera and when does it finish?
content.question: How long is The Phantom of the Opera and when does it finish?
